mapper.select: select s.sell_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name, s.sell_date, w.warehouse_name, s.pay_type, s.sell_price, s.sell_amount from sell s, customer c, product p, warehouse w where s.customer_id = c.customer_id and s.product_id = p.product_id and s.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id

select s.cbuy_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name, s.cbuy_date, w.warehouse_name, s.pay_type, s.cbuy_priceout, s.cbuy_amount from company_buy s, customer c, product p, warehouse w where s.customer_id = c.customer_id and s.product_id = p.product_id and s.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id
